thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 9 of 819
thread.title: Tim

author: Tim
title: Tim
text:
3.8.17//1438hrsMT
Tried inkfarm for the first time last month; bought an HP62XL
black cartridge at a great value. When I installed it, nothing
happened, as so often occurs with remanufactured/refills.
The HP5740 printer didn't recognize the cartridge; a routine
& built in complication with any HP proprietary devices and
products. Followed all of inkfarms helpful instructions included
in the package; but, no luck. Called inkfarm's customer service -
Dio(n?) - who walked me through a few more tricks; but, still
nothing. He immediately placed another order which I received
in 3 days and returned the defective cartridge.
The replacement cartridge worked the first time and ever
since, though the HP printer diagnostic shows there is NO
black cartridge installed. It's as good a color quality and
performance as an HP original at half the price.
I was impressed not only by the price; but, also the live
no-wait, hassle-free customer service and the free round-trip
shipping .
Kudos to Dio(n?) and inkfarm. Will buy again.
